button_destroy.componentleveltooltip: Dismantle||Dismantle this building for a refund of {{CcoBattleToggleableSlotBuildable:Ceiling(RefundValue)}} supplies

callback_with_context.context_function_id: BattleRoot.IsToggleSlotListVisible && (( EnabledIndex != -1 && IsMapBarrier() == false ) || ( CanInteract(BattleRoot.PlayerArmyContext) && IsMapBarrier() == false)) && ( IsDestructionInProgress == false || CanOwnerInteract() )
